Key Arguments: The submission expresses a strong opposition to the proposed legislation, equating it to censorship similar to that experienced in communist regimes.
The author perceives Australia as a totalitarian state, likening it to a 'capitalist North Korea'.
The submission criticizes what the author sees as a biased belief system, specifically mentioning 'scientific materialism'.
Notable Quotes: I think that Australia is undoubtfully a fascist country and its political system is the dystopian totalitarianism.
It is a kind of capitalist North Korea.
I do not care what You will decide upon Your plans to censor like the communists censored news in my home country in the past.
